alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 07 at 6:11AM MST until November 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, with the strongest gusts south of I-80, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. This includes I-80 from the Nevada border to Salt Lake City.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
